body: Damn, never thought I'd be rooting for someone to kill his wife
The wife is extremely hot. Too bad he is not taking good care of her. The guy is the ungrateful bastard and even had thoughts of killing her.
I wouldn't hate the wife so much if she wasn't such a manipulative bitch. And to spring the yandere on us is so cliché but I'm still rooting for her. Kill the cheater, wife the yandere
The wife is so detestable, so is his assistant but if I was to choose one it would the assistant, but both should be slaughtered and the guy with the MC wife.
The whore wife is not worth it just fuck her one last time kill her and move on to with the assistant.
